name: CGImageMetadata
desc: An immutable object that contains the XMP metadata associated with an image.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataCreateFromXMPData(CFData) -> CGImageMetadata?
items.desc: Creates a collection of metadata tags from the specified XMP data.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataCopyTagWithPath(CGImageMetadata, CGImageMetadataTag?, CFString) -> CGImageMetadataTag?
items.desc: Searches for a specific metadata tag within a metadata collection.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataCopyTags(CGImageMetadata) -> CFArray?
items.desc: Returns an array of root-level metadata tags from the specified metadata object.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataCopyTagMatchingImageProperty(CGImageMetadata, CFString, CFString) -> CGImageMetadataTag?
items.desc: Searches for the specified image property and, if found, returns the corresponding tag object.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataCopyStringValueWithPath(CGImageMetadata, CGImageMetadataTag?, CFString) -> CFString?
items.desc: Searches the metadata for the specified tag, and returns its string value if it exists.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataEnumerateTagsUsingBlock(CGImageMetadata, CFString?, CFDictionary?, CGImageMetadataTagBlock)
items.desc: Enumerates the tags of a metadata object and executes the specified block on each tag.

items.name: typealias CGImageMetadataTagBlock
items.desc: The block to execute when enumerating the tags of a metadata object.

items.name: let kCGImageMetadataEnumerateRecursively: CFString
items.desc: An option to enumerate recursively through a set of metadata tags.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataCreateXMPData(CGImageMetadata, CFDictionary?) -> CFData?
items.desc: Returns a data object that contains the metadata objectâ€™s contents serialized into the XMP format.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataGetTypeID() -> CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the type identifier for metadata objects.
